articles.title: Scientists finds new inroads in fast charging for lithium-ion batteries - Nanowerk
articles.description: Scientists have long thought the laws of physics limited how fast you could safely recharge a battery, but new research has opened the door to creating a battery that can be recharged in just a fraction of the time.

articles.title: Outer Space Object Is a Cookie-shaped Part of a Planet - VOA Learning English
articles.description:
A new study says a mysterious, cookie-shaped object that entered our solar system likely broke off from a distant planet.
Arizona State University astronomers reported earlier this month that the strange 45-meter object appears to be made of frozen nitrogen.
